1.log_text:
a deep pool of slime

leading north to a grotto.
examine_text:
You examine the pool of slime and upon closer inspection you find that it leads to

a cave system flooded by slime

leading in an unknown direction.
You could try to dive in, hold your breath and swim towards the end?
On closer inspection the glinting object is revealed to be a key.
It looks very old and seems to be made of iron. It has some slime on it.

3.log_text:
a tight cave

leading south out of the grotto.
examine_text:
You examine

the cave entrance

, it looks big enough for you to fit inside. The cave leads south.
